title: Multimodal analysis stratifies the genetic susceptibility and reveals the pathogenic mechanism of kidney injury in diabeticnephropathy
text: Hanying et al. uncovered genetic susceptibility and pathogenic mechanisms of kidney injury in diabetic nephropathy through multimodal analysis, providing new directions for precision diagnosis and treatment.

title: CycSeq: Leveraging Cyclic Data Generation for Accurate Perturbation Prediction in Single-Cell RNA-Seq
text: Yi Cheng et al. proposed a cyclic data generation approach to improve the accuracy of perturbation prediction in single-cell RNA sequencing.

title: SpliceTransformer predicts tissue-specific splicing linked to human diseases
text: Ningyuan et al. developed SpliceTransformer, a deep-learning framework that predicts tissue-specific RNA splicing alterations linked to human diseases based on genomic sequence.

title: Searching targeted fusion in bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing data
text: Xilu et al. developed Anchored-fusion, a highly sensitive tool for detecting gene fusion events in both bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing data.

title: Identifying pathogenic variants using a multimodal machine learning approach
text: Yicheng et al develop MAGPIE, a machine learning-based multi-modality accurate pathogenicity predictor for all non-synonymous mutations. (Genome Med, 2024)

title: Detecting somatic mutations de novo from single-cell RNA sequencing data
text: Tianyun et al develop RESA -- Recurrently Expressed SNV Analysis that identifies expressed somatic mutations from scRNA-seq with high precision (Genome Medicine, 2023)

title: Temporally integrated transcriptome analysis reveals ASFV pathology and host response dynamics
text: Providing new insights into ASFV pathogenicity research and novel drug or vaccine targets
